import React from 'react' import {connection} from 'react-redux' import CustomButton from '../custom-button/custom-button.component' import {addItem} from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions.js' import './collection-item.styles.scss' const CollectionItem = ({id, name, price, imageUrl}) => (
{name} {price}
< CustomButton inverted > Add to cart
) export default CollectionItem
